text:
Nevermind, found my answer in the documentation :
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/understanding-the-crm?_ga=2.208910994.1839937018.1602061139-766411721.1584638587>

Hi I have a question regarding Custom Objects,
I have a few custom objects on my project, within workflows I can create New objects for some of my custom object types but not others is there something that needs to be done to make it available in workflows?

Hi everyone,

My team and I are looking to integrate HubSpot and Xero.
At a high level, we would like this integration to
1. For subscriptions, we create the draft invoices in Xero based on a) Closed / Won in HubSpot, and b) After subscription start date is set. Those draft invoices would cover whatever the subscription period is.
2. We start invoicing based on the start date rather than waiting for the first day ofÂ next month.

Does anyone have experience integrating Xero and HubSpot? If so, my team would love to hire someone for this short sprint.
